skillTree.localised_description: This loyal creature is as mighty and swift as a Great Eagle.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can fire while on the move.
Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

target_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any attacker.

skillTree.localised_description: Pulled by a Swiftfeather Roc, this enchanted vessel is a proper chariot for a Sea Helm.

skillTree.localised_description: A trident may actually not be the most advanced cutting edge in the field of cutting edges, but once something fleshy is hit it stays hit.
The High Elves possess a natural skill that far outstrips the prowess of ordinary mortals.
The Trickster God knows all manner of ploys and ruses that can be used to counter missile attacks.
Knowledge can be used as a shield against magical attack.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: This Lord will be wounded instead of killed in battle

skillTree.localised_description: Asuryan's adherents believe they are part of the Creator's plan and will never be abandoned.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -5% for Phoenix Guard units
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +5 for Phoenix Guard units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The supporters of Hoeth bask in their patron's generosity, for it was he who gifted the Elves with much of their revered knowledge.

skillTree.localised_description: The God of Smiths knows the Elves will need fire and fury to survive; his blessings steel them for the darker days ahead.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -5% for Dragon Princes units
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +5 for Dragon Princes units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Isha's husband is the father of all Elves; his blessings are given to those who hunt for food, but woe betide those who kill for sport.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -5% for White Lions of Chrace, War Lions and Lion Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

effects.description:
Leadership: +5 for White Lions of Chrace units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The Goddess of Fertility blesses farmers and mothers, but also those votaries who are caught abroad in dangerous lands.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -5% for Spearmen, Rangers and Archers units
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +5 for Spearmen and Archers units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Those who follow the Bringer of Wrath and Fire are blessed with direct and forceful solutions to the obstacles in their way.
As the Lord of the Sea, Mathlann is patron to sailors and explorers; he is prayed to by Elves about to embark on a voyage or seeking new lands.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -5% for Lothern Sea Guard units
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +5 for Lothern Sea Guard units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: If you can hold you ground when all around are falling into the cracks, then that's the patronage of Hukon, God of Earthquakes.
These enchanted arrows have been carefully crafted from the pale-wooded trees that grow near the Grove of Avelorn.
Panic and fear are things that happen to others.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Dark Elves
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Greenskins, Skaven, Dark Elves, Beastmen, Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos, Chaos Dwarfs and Norsca

skillTree.localised_description: Although precision in missile combat is something that can be learned, this one was born with a high degree of natural talent.
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
The forest teaches a warrior not only when to fire but where, which makes a bigger difference.
What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
The fundamentals of the Lothern Navy has always been discipline and firepower. Never forget that. And magic. And dragons. But mostly discipline and firepower.

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
Things go a lot smoother when you are friendly with half of Lothern's nobility.
“Underlying most arguments against the free market is a lack of belief in freedom itself.”
The Lords rule, the peasants toil. Nothing has changed in over a thousand years.
This warrior has been ambushed previously and got themselves and many of their compatriots away safely. Such things make one naturally suspicious.
Someone has to ensure the numbers and quality of recruits remain high.
"The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Reinforcements supporting this army can have their arrival point adjusted by +250 metres without incurring any time penalty
Reinforcements supporting this army can have their arrival point adjusted by +600 metres without incurring any time penalty
Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present
Reinforcements supporting this army can have their arrival point adjusted by +1000 metres without incurring any time penalty

skillTree.localised_description: A good quartermaster can ration equipment and foodstuffs efficiently, making supplies last longer.
The ancient Asur arts teach one how to heal as well as how to harm.

skillTree.localised_description: Far removed from the petty squabbles of other races, many High Elves are able to devote themselves to learning, magic and the arts.

skillTree.localised_description: This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "I wasn't told I would be leading a force of forest savages. Get the ranks in order right this instant!"
They say even his scars have scars of their own.
This commander personally makes sure supplies are more than in order. Being well-connected also helps.
There is nothing natural in how this Elf is invigorated by stormy weather.

effects.description: Passive ability: "Regeneration" when fighting at sea

backgroundSkills.localised_description: An enemy killed at distance is an enemy that can't stab you in the neck.
This commander was trained under the Sea Lord and learned many of his... tactics.

Attribute: Stalk for all Lothern Sea Guard and Company units
	(Lord's army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can move hidden in any terrain.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: This Elf is genuinely as inspiring as the heroes of ages past. And straight enough that he could be used to measure starwood planks.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: This commander had one too many grudges against the Druchii. Some say you could see Tethlis the Slayer in his eyes...

backgroundSkills.localised_description:
For one good reason or another, this officer is not entrusted with more than a basic flotilla.
	The fleet will not grow in size and it is only allowed the most basic recruitment.
